rows: The loan record associated with this credit card. Any updates to loan balances, limits, or repayment details are reflected on the credit card page to ensure data consistency.
Outstanding loan amount tied to this card.
Card currency linked to the associated bank account.
Number of days before interest is charged on purchases.
Annual percentage rate applied to purchase transactions.

html:
Field

Description

Linked loan

The loan record associated with this credit card. Any updates to loan balances, limits, or repayment details are reflected on the credit card page to ensure data consistency.

Loan current balance

Outstanding loan amount tied to this card.

Currency

Card currency linked to the associated bank account.

Credit limit

Maximum allowed credit amount.

Available credit

Remaining usable credit balance.

Grace period

Number of days before interest is charged on purchases.

Purchase APR

Annual percentage rate applied to purchase transactions.

Cash advance APR

Annual percentage rate for cash advances.
